description:
Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#123-202) has bitwise-xor operator ^ instead of the exponentiation operator **: 
	 - inverse = (3 * denominator) ^ 2 (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#184)
markdown:
[Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256)](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#L123-L202) has bitwise-xor operator ^ instead of the exponentiation operator **: 
	 - [inverse = (3 * denominator) ^ 2](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#L184)

description:
PepoStablecoin.getRatio(address) (src/PepoStablecoin.sol#87-90) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- (debtCollateralRatios[addr].debt * 100) / (debtCollateralRatios[addr].collateral / 10 ** 18 * getEthPrice()) (src/PepoStablecoin.sol#88-89)
markdown:
[PepoStablecoin.getRatio(address)](src/PepoStablecoin.sol#L87-L90) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [(debtCollateralRatios[addr].debt * 100) / (debtCollateralRatios[addr].collateral / 10 ** 18 * getEthPrice())](src/PepoStablecoin.sol#L88-L89)

description:
Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#123-202) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- denominator = denominator / twos (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#169)
	- inverse *= 2 - denominator * inverse (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#190)
markdown:
[Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256)](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#L123-L202) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:

	- [inverse *= 2 - denominator * inverse](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#L190)

description:
Reentrancy in PepoStablecoin.payBack(uint256) (src/PepoStablecoin.sol#44-62):
	External calls:
	- address(_msgSender()).transfer(collateralAsset) (src/PepoStablecoin.sol#57)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- debtCollateralRatios[_msgSender()].collateral = 0 (src/PepoStablecoin.sol#58)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ReturnCollateralAssets(_msgSender(),collateralAsset,true) (src/PepoStablecoin.sol#60)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [PepoStablecoin.payBack(uint256)](src/PepoStablecoin.sol#L44-L62):
	External calls:
	- [address(_msgSender()).transfer(collateralAsset)](src/PepoStablecoin.sol#L57)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [debtCollateralRatios[_msgSender()].collateral = 0](src/PepoStablecoin.sol#L58)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ReturnCollateralAssets(_msgSender(),collateralAsset,true)](src/PepoStablecoin.sol#L60)
